review: I was bummed to find out that the Chromecast doesn't support Amazon Prime Video.  Apparently you can kind of jury rig it to run from your browser, but seems like more effort than just watching APV through the app on my iPad.  It took a while to install/run properly, but was easy to do (make sure all apps and OS are the most current).Using it in conjunction with my TV sleep timer and Netflix resulted in Netflix shutting itself off, and the main "decorative" Chromecast screen displaying.  Sometimes, it's still less of a hassle to use iPad than to navigate through Netflix AND the Chromecast.Overall, does what it's supposed to do, relatively easily, plus it was quite inexpensive.  Would recommend to people getting rid of cable who don't want to spend a lot.
